mapper.select: select project.project_id, project.project_name, project.project_type, project.project_class, project.project_start_date, project.project_end_date, project.organization_id, project.client_id, project.project_manager, project.project_leader, project.note, project.sales, project.version_no from project inner join project_user on project.project_id = project_user.project_id inner join projects_by_user_request on project_user.user_id = projects_by_user_request.user_id where projects_by_user_request.id = #{requestId} order by project.project_start_date, project.project_end_date, project.project_name
mapper.update: update projects_by_user set file_name = #{fileName}, create_datetime = #{createDatetime}, expire_datetime = #{expireDatetime} where request_id = #{requestId}
